sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Item(props) { const { setItem} = useContext(UserContext) const navigate = useNavigate() return (
{ setItem(props.item) navigate("/ProductPage") }} className='item'>

{props.item.name}

1 Review

{props.item.price}$

) } export default Item
